pair of $(this.trait:size) {? | $(this.trait:polished) | $(this.trait:polished) |} {? equal | $(this.trait:color) | none | {? equal | $(this.trait:material) | none | plain | $(this.trait:material) } | $(this.trait:color) {? equal | $(this.trait:material) | none || $(this.trait:material) } } $(this.trait:type) $(this.trait:brief). {? | $(this.trait:lacquer) | It is lacquered with a $(this.trait:lacquer) finish.} {? | $(this.trait:variation) | It bears a $(this.trait:variation) design.} {? | $(this.details:gem:snames) | Remarkable $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material)s are embedded into the wood.} {? | $(this.trait:engraving) | $(this.trait:engraving).}

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the $(this.trait:material) handle of a carding comb
The pair of carding combs is fitted with a contoured $(this.trait:material) handle for a firm grip.
one of the metal tines of a carding comb
Two dozen three-inch sharp metal tines protrude from the shaft of the carding comb, arranged close together.
the metal tines of a carding comb
Two dozen three-inch sharp metal tines protrude from the shaft of the carding comb, arranged close together.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "Fitted with a contoured handle for a firm grip, each of these carding combs is set with a shaft on one end perpendicular to the handle. Two dozen three-inch metal tines protrude from the shaft, arranged close together for carding raw fleece into fiber."
